description: Adds sources to an existing bridge.

parameters.name: BridgeArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the bridge that you want to update.

parameters.name: Sources
parameters.description: The sources that you want to add to this bridge. (dict) --- Add an output to a bridge. FlowSource (dict) --- The source of the flow. The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the flow to use as a source of this bridge. FlowVpcInterfaceAttachment (dict) --- The name of the VPC interface attachment to use for this source. VpcInterfaceName (string) --- The name of the VPC interface to use for this resource. The name of the flow source. This name is used to reference the source and must be unique among sources in this bridge. NetworkSource (dict) --- The source of the network. The network source multicast IP. MulticastSourceSettings (dict) --- The settings related to the multicast source. MulticastSourceIp (string) --- The IP address of the source for source-specific multicast (SSM). The name of the network source. The network source's gateway network name. The network source port. The network source protocol.

nested_params.name: FlowArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the flow to use as a source of this bridge.

nested_params.name: FlowVpcInterfaceAttachment
nested_params.description: The name of the VPC interface attachment to use for this source.

nested_params.name: VpcInterfaceName
nested_params.description: The name of the VPC interface to use for this resource.

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the flow source. This name is used to reference the source and must be unique among sources in this bridge.

nested_params.name: MulticastSourceSettings
nested_params.description: The settings related to the multicast source.

nested_params.name: MulticastSourceIp
nested_params.description: The IP address of the source for source-specific multicast (SSM).

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the network source. This name is used to reference the source and must be unique among sources in this bridge.

nested_params.name: NetworkName
nested_params.description: The network source's gateway network name.

nested_items.name: BridgeArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the bridge that you added sources to.

nested_items.name: Sources
nested_items.description: The sources that you added to this bridge.

nested_items.name: FlowSource
nested_items.description: The source of the associated flow.

nested_items.name: FlowArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the cloud flow used as a source of this bridge.

nested_items.name: FlowVpcInterfaceAttachment
nested_items.description: The name of the VPC interface attachment to use for this source.

nested_items.name: VpcInterfaceName
nested_items.description: The name of the VPC interface to use for this resource.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the flow source.

nested_items.name: OutputArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the output.

nested_items.name: NetworkSource
nested_items.description: The network source for the bridge.

nested_items.name: MulticastSourceSettings
nested_items.description: The settings related to the multicast source.

nested_items.name: MulticastSourceIp
nested_items.description: The IP address of the source for source-specific multicast (SSM).

nested_items.description: The name of the network source.

nested_items.description: The network source's gateway network name.
